fixed_skill.desc: Decrease 1 foe's Attack, Defense, ailment accuracy, and ailment resistance by 7.8%/8.2%/8.6%, and Speed by 5. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Debilitate

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase Attack by 19.6% for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Attack Master IV

innate_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 142.5/151.8/161.1% of Attack. Inflict 2 Curse stacks on the foe.
innate_skill.name: Demonic Decree

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 29.7%. Decrease SP cost of Curse skills by 40%.
passive_skill.name: Cursed Bloodline

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 29.7%. Decrease SP cost of Curse skills by 45%.
passive_skill.name: Cursed Bloodline I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 29.7%. Decrease SP cost of Curse skills by 50%.
passive_skill.name: Cursed Bloodline II

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 29.7%. Decrease SP cost of Curse skills by 55%.
passive_skill.name: Cursed Bloodline III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
